item.title: How I created this website with Hugo
item.description: I followed this youtube tutorial (https://youtu.be/LIFvgrRxdt4?si=zdZ7nkT4w2id8c97). This tutorial is really simple and explains it in the simplest way. But dtill it took a lot of time and trial and error for me to get it done. .

item.title: Manas Varma K
item.description: I am Manas Varma K, currently an S1 B.Tech CSE-AI students in Amrita Vishwa Vidhyapeetham. I want to be a developer, explore the computer and tech world. I want to try all the new tech products, learn about them and their working. I also like to travel. In future I want to travel to many countries and also try all the different types of food. My hobbies include gaming, playing cricket, football and badminton.
